name: Dario Colazzo
content: Dario Colazzo's Home Page Dario Colazzo Professor at UniversitÃ© Paris-Dauphine Member of the LAMSADE Office: P623 Phone: +33 1 44 05 44 09 Mail: Place du MarÃ©chal de Lattre de Tassigny, 75 775 Paris Cedex 16, France. Research My research interests focus on databases and programming languages, and include cloud databases and type systems for safe and efficient processing of semi-structured data. Past research interests included type systems for the lambda-calculus and pi-calculus. Publications JesÃºs Camacho-RodrÃ­guez, Dario Colazzo, and Ioana Manolescu.
